item.graytomorrow.cloak.tooltip[1]: Lasts for 1 minute, or until deactivated
item.graytomorrow.cloak.tooltip[2]: When deactivated, become fully blind for
item.graytomorrow.cloak.tooltip[3]: however long you were invisible for
message.graytomorrow.hood_up: You put on your Cloak of Gray Tomorrow's hood!
message.graytomorrow.hood_down: You removed your Cloak of Gray Tomorrow's hood.
message.graytomorrow.no_block: You can't use blocks, you're blind!
message.graytomorrow.no_item: You can't use items, you're blind!
